com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.configuration

Annotation Type I2cSensor

  • Deprecated. 
    Use I2cDeviceType instead. I2cSensor annotations may be placed on classes which are implementations of I2C sensors. Such classes will be configurable using the configuration UI, and instances thereof will appear in the hardware map in the uncategorized mapping. Classes on which this annotation is placed must implement HardwareDevice and have a constructor with at least one of the following signatures:
    1. ctor(I2cDeviceSync i2cDeviceSynch)
    2. ctor(I2cDeviceSyncSimple i2cDeviceSynch)
      3. (Only used when configured on a REV Hub)
    3. ctor(I2cDevice i2cDevice)
      4. (Only used when configured on a CDIM)
    4. ctor(I2cController i2cController, int port)
      5. (Only used when configured on a CDIM) 

    @Documented
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Deprecated
public @interface I2cSensor
    See Also:
    HardwareMap.put(String, HardwareDevice), HardwareMap.get(Class, String), HardwareMap.get(String)

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      Deprecated. 
      Specifies a brief descriptive phrase that describes this kind of sensor.
      java.lang.String name
      Deprecated. 
      Specifies the name of the sensor to be displayed in configuration user interfaces.
      java.lang.String xmlTag
      Deprecated. 
      Specifies the XML tag to use to represent configured instances of the annotated class as recorded in saved robot configurations.

    • Element Detail

      • xmlTag

        public abstract java.lang.String xmlTag
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies the XML tag to use to represent configured instances of the annotated class as recorded in saved robot configurations. You should choose a tag that is different from all other configuration types.
        Default:
        ""

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies the name of the sensor to be displayed in configuration user interfaces.
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Deprecated. 
        Specifies a brief descriptive phrase that describes this kind of sensor.
        Default:
        "an I2c sensor"
